summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from February 21, 2020, discussing attorney Gloria Allred's publicity stunt in London. She placed an advertisement on a school bus circling Buckingham Palace, featuring Prince Andrew's image and a message urging him to speak with the FBI regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case. The email includes a forwarded news report and a photograph of the bus.

keyFacts: Attorney Gloria Allred orchestrated a publicity stunt on February 21, 2020, placing an advertisement on a bus that circled Buckingham Palace calling for Prince Andrew to contact the FBI.
The bus advertisement featured a large picture of Prince Andrew with the message: 'If you see this man please ask him to call the FBI to answer their questions.'
Allred represents some of Jeffrey Epstein's victims and was attending the Harvey Weinstein trial in Lower Manhattan when she discussed the stunt.
The event highlights ongoing public and legal pressure on Prince Andrew to cooperate with the FBI's investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's sex trafficking network.
